I think the ercp ressource file is missing in the plugin...
*** Bug 105753 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

The missing resource is in the jar of the mobile extension, there is no default
boundle. On a french PPC it crashes for this reason !
It's been fixed and checked into cvs, will be included in next milestone build.

causedBy.message: Can't find resource for bundle java.util.PropertyResourceBundle, key Command_Menu_Name
